All Classes

Class
Description
AbstractObject
Superclass for all objects in the model.
AbstractPassage
A class that stores the passage info that is used by OH-HECC and HECC-UP.
AttributeString<T>
This is a utilty class which can be used to show a value with a name for it bit easier than trying to include methods to completely rewrite every individual string whenever the value associated with that string is updated by any amount, y'know?
ChooseFile
Basically responsible for allowing the author to pick a .hecc file to open and such.
ClickableObject
Interface of objects that can be clicked
ClickableObjectWithUUID
Interface for an object that is clickable and has a UUID
ControllableModelInterface
An interface that can be called by a Controller to control a Model
DeletedLinkPresentException
An exception that will get thrown if a passage still contains a link to a deleted passage.
DrawableObject
Literally just has a `draw(Graphics2D g)` method (used for drawing)
DrawableObjectWithText
Like DrawableObject but it also has a method for drawing the text of the object.
DrawablePassageObject
A drawable interface for the PassageObject.
DuplicatePassageNameException
exception for when passages share names
EditableMetadata
A class that represents the Metadata (except it's editable instead)
EditableMetadataTests
This class has some tests for the EditableMetadata
EditablePassage
Like Passage but this time it's actually Editable!
EditablePassageTest
Some tests for the EditablePassage class
EditModelInterface
A relatively lightweight interface for EditModelObject objects to use instead of the PassageModel class.
EditModelObject
This is basically the same as AbstractObject.
EditorWindowInterface
Lighterweight interface for GenericEditorWindow, for purposes of passing it to the main program
EditWindowGameDataInterface
A somewhat more lightweight interface for the GameDataObject, used by the ComponentEditingWindows.
EmptyPassageException
exception for when a passage has no content
FolderOutputter
This class is responsible for outputting the HECCIN' Game into the folder it's supposed to be output into.
FolderOutputterMetadataInterface
This is an interface for the Metadata class to be used by FolderOutputter
GameDataGetterParserInterface
An interface for the OhHeccParser that can be passed as an argument to the GameDataObject constructor
GameDataObject
A single class that can encapsulate all the game data stuff
GameDataObjectTests
Some tests for the GameDataObject (mostly regarding the UUID that's supposed to point to the start passage)
GenericEditorWindow
A superclass for both of the editor window classes (because they both use all these things)
Heccable
An interface which indicates that this class's data can be converted into HECC code
HeccCeption
standard HECC exception
HeccItRunner
The main class/entry point for the program.
HeccParser
This parses the full HECC code bottom text
HeccUpGUI
This class is basically a GUI for the HECC-UP stuff so a user can actually, y'know, hecc up their stuff.
HeccUpHandler
An intermediate class, between the user-facing LoggerInterface object, and the lower-level PassageParser and FolderOutputter objects
HeccUpTests
Some tests for HECC-UP
HeccUpTests.HeccUpTestConstants
Some constants for use in the tests.
HeccUpTests.HeccUpTestLogger
Basically a LoggerInterface class that records the logged stuff.
ImageManager
This basically reads the image assets from the assets/imageAssets folder so they can be included in the jar.
InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
A HeccCeption for invalid metadata declarations (to be thrown when a user attempts to give invalid metadata when editing it via OH-HECC)
InvalidPassageNameException
exception for when a passage has an invalid name
LoggerInterface
An interface for boundary classes that are supposed to be able to log data.
Metadata
This object basically represents the metadata for the HECCIN' Game
MetadataEditingInterface
An interface to be used for editing the metadata.
MetadataEditorWindow
Basically this class is a dialog window to be used for editing EditableMetadata objects (or, well, MetadataEditingInterface instances.
MetadataReadingInterface
This is an interface which encapsulates all the metadata reading functionality Only contains static methods
MetadataTests
Some tests for the Metadata class
MissingStartingPassageException
exception for when the specified start passage doesn't actually exist
Model
A superclass for the 'Model' bit of 'MVC'.
ModelBitsPassageInterface
An interface for the EditablePassage, used by the PassageObject in src/oh_hecc/mvc/model_bits.
ModelButtonObject
This class basically represents the buttons that will appear across the bottom of the model, allowing the user to do things like access the metadata editing window, add a new passage, save their work, save+quit, etc.
ModelController
A controller that basically just controls a ControllableModelInterface
MoveableObject
An interface for objects that can be moved.
MVCGameDataInterface
A lighterweight interface for the GameDataObject that will have the functionality needed by PassageModel.java
Currently very lightweight because it doesn't do anything yet.
NoMatchException
Exception used by the Metadata regex stuff, thrown if the matcher doesn't match anything
NoPassagesException
exception for when there are no passages in the .hecc file
ObjectWithAPosition
An interface that literally just has a 'Vector2D getPosition()' method
ObjectWithAPositionAndUUID
An interface for an object that has a position and a UUID
ObjectWithUUID
Interface for an object that has a UUID
OhHeccNetworkFrame
This class holds the JFrame which holds the View object responsible for showing the Model to the user
OhHeccParser
The class which is responsible for parsing the .hecc data within OH-HECC.
OhHeccParserTest
Some tests for the OH-HECC parser.
OldHeccUpMain
Deprecated.
just use HeccUpGUI instead lmao
OutputtablePassage
A version of the AbstractPassage used within HECC-UP.
OutputtablePassageTest
Some tests for the OutputtablePassage
Parseable
Currently only holds some constants with passage name regexes, and a static method to validate a passage name via regex
Passage
Deprecated.
use oh_hecc.game_parts.passage.OutputtablePassage instead.
PassageEditingInterface
An interface for the passages, intended for use with editing them.
PassageEditorWindow
A class that basically is a window that allows a user to edit an EditablePassage (and indirectly edit the other passages it's linked to)
PassageEditWindowMetadataInterface
Deprecated.
not used by the PassageEditorWindow now, made redundant by the EditWindowGameDataInterface
PassageLinkObject
Okay so this is basically an object that represents a link from one PassageObject to another.
PassageModel
Okay so this is the Model of the actual network of passages and such
PassageModel.CurrentActivity
An enumeration to represent the current action being performed by the model
PassageModelEditablePassageInterface
An interface for the PassageEditingInterface for use in the PassageModel
PassageObject
ok so basically this represents an EditablePassage object but it's an GUI form instead.
PassageOutputtingInterface
An interface for the OutputtablePassages used by HECC-UP for basically just outputting the passages.
PassageOutputtingLinkCheckingInterface
An interface for getting the linked passages of a given passage and such, for the sole purpose of the recursive linked passage finding stuff in hecc-up
PassageReadingInterface
This encapsulates all the passage functionality that's exclusively used for when passages are being read from .hecc format into actual usable objects.
PassageStatus
A set of possible statuses for this passage
ResizeableObject
An interface for objects that can be resized
SelectableObject
Interface for an object which can be selected/deselected/moved.
SharedMetadata
A high-level interface for the Metadata class, holding things that are needed by its sub interfaces/high level functionality
SharedPassage
An interface for EditablePassage that encapsulates the basic things for both reading/editing a passage.
StartHighlightObject
An object that will be visible behind the starting PassageObject basically as a highlight for it
StringObject
An AbstractObject that basically just displays a string (White text with black border) at a given position in the model.
TextAssetReader
A utility class that can read text stuff
UndefinedPassageException
exception used when an undefined passage is linked
UpdatableLinkedUUIDsInterface
Literally just has the updateLinkedUUIDs method, for the loops where this has to be called for every passage.
UpdatableObject
An interface with an 'update()' method (for objects that are supposed to be updatable).
Variable
This class is to be used to keep track of individual variables defined in the metadata
VariableTests
Some tests for the Variable class (basically all testing the constructor)
Vector2D
A 2D Cartesian vector.
View
Deprecated.
not actually used in the final product.
ViewableModelInterface
Deprecated.
the view isn't actually being used, so there's no reason to have something that could be used to view the model with the view, y'know?
